     <a class="headline" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|Rec|news|wipeout|title|index 2" href="https://www.devonlive.com/news/devon-news/call-turn-devon-ghost-ships-5213152">
      Call to turn Devon 'ghost ships' cruise liners into pop-up hotels
     </a>
     <div>
      <a class="label" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|Rec|news|wipeout|Tag|Fire|index 2" href="https://www.devonlive.com/all-about/torbay">
       Torbay
      </a>
      <div class="comments-count">
       <a aria-label="Comments for Call to turn Devon 'ghost ships' cruise liners into pop-up hotels" class="viafoura" href="https://www.devonlive.com/news/devon-news/call-turn-devon-ghost-ships-5213152#comments-section">
        <span class="count-number">
         <vf-conversations-count vf-container-id="devonlive-prod-5213152">
         </vf-conversations-count>
        </span>
       </a>
      </div>
      <a class="description" data-link-tracking="undefineddescriptionundefined" href="https://www.devonlive.com/news/devon-news/call-turn-devon-ghost-ships-5213152">
       Steve Darling says it would be a good opportunity to use the huge cruise liners which have become a feature off the coast the pandemic
      </a>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="teaser">

      <div class="video-icon section-theme-border section-theme">
      </div>
     </figure>
     <a class="headline" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|Rec|news|topStories|title|index 2" href="https://www.devonlive.com/news/devon-news/latest-people-appear-magistrates-court-5206707">
      The latest people to appear at magistrates' court in Devon
     </a>
     <div>
      <a class="label" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|Rec|news|topStories|Tag|Fire|index 2" href="https://www.devonlive.com/all-about/in-court">
       In Court
      </a>
      <a class="description" data-link-tracking="undefineddescriptionundefined" href="https://www.devonlive.com/news/devon-news/latest-people-appear-magistrates-court-5206707">
       DevonLive looks at those who have appeared at courts in Exeter, Barnstaple and South Devon.
      </a>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="teaser">
     <figure data-mod="image">
      <a aria-label="The famous Devon buildings that now lie abandoned and forgotten" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|Rec|news|topStories|image|index 3" href="https://www.devonlive.com/news/devon-news/famous-devon-buildings-now-lay-5205839">

      </a>
     </figure>

     </a>
     <div>

      </a>

PA Photo. Picture date: Sunday December 20, 2020. Prime Minister Boris Johnson cancelled Christmas for almost 18 million people across London and eastern and south-east England, after scientists warned of the rapid spread of the new variant coronavirus. In the rest of England, the planned Christmas easing of the restrictions allowing three households to meet over the festive period will be severely curtailed to apply to Christmas Day only. See PA story HEALTH Coronavirus. oPrebidEnabled&quot;:&quot;true&quot;,&quot;delayVideoAdsUntilConsented&quot;:&quot;true&quot;,&quot;appNexusVideoPrebidEnabled&quot;:&quot;true&quot;},&quot;pageStyle&quot;:&quot;default&quot;}"             <a class="label" data-link-tracking="PostArticle|Rec|news|mostRead|Tag|Fire|index 4" href="https://www.devonlive.com/all-about/newton-abbot">
             Newton Abbot
            </a>
            <a class="description" data-link-tracking="undefineddescriptionundefined" href="https://www.devonlive.com/news/devon-news/pupils-return-newton-abbot-school-5206209">
             Foundation stage pupils went back to home schooling for two days last week due to an inaccurate lateral flow test
            </a>
           </div>
          </div>

'"+a+"'");throw c.code="MODULE_NOT_FOUND",c}var s=n[a]={exports:{}};t[a][0].call(s.exports,function(r){return i(t[a][1][r]||r)},s,s.exports,r,t,n,e)}return n[a].exports}for(var o="function"==typeof Array.isArray(r)?function(r,t){for(var n,e="",o="",a=Array.isArray(t),u=0;u<r.length;u++)(n=i(r[u]))&&(a&&t[u]&&(n=f(n)),e=e+o+n,o=" ");return e}(r,t):r&&"object"==typeof r?function(r){var t}return r+""}function a(r,t,n,e){if(!1===t||null==t||!t&&("class"===r||"style"===r))return"";if(!0===t)return" "+(e?r:r+'="'+r+'"');var i=typeof "+r+"='"+t.replace(/'/g,"&#39;")+"'"}n.merge=function r(t,n){if(1===arguments.length){for(var e=t[0],i=1;i<t.length;i++)e=r(e,t[i]);return e}for(var a in n)if("class"===a){var t[a]=n[a];return t},n.classes=i,n.style=o,n.attr=a,n.attrs=function(r,t){var n="";for(var u in r)if(e.call(r,u)){var f=r[u];if("class"===u){f=i(f),n=a(u,f,!1,t)+n;continue}"style"===u&&(f=o(f)),n+=a(u,f,!1,t)}return n};var u=/["&<>]/;function f(r){var t=""+r,n=u.exec(t);if(!n)return r;var e,i,o,a="";for(e=n.index,i=0;e<t.length;e++){switch(t.charCodeAt(e)){case 34:o="&quot;";break;case 38:o="&amp;";break;case 60:o="&lt;";break;case 62:o="&gt;";break;default:continue}i!==e&&(a+=t.substring(i,e)),i=e+1,a+=o}return i!==e?a+t.substring(i,e):a}n.escape=f,n.rethrow=function t(n,e,i,o){if(!(n instanceof Error))throw n;if(!("undefined"==typeof window&&e||o))throw n.message+=" on line "+i,n;try{o=o||r(1).readFileSync(e,"utf8")}catch(r){t(n,null,i)}var a=3,u=o.split("\n"),f=Math.max(i-a,0),c=Math.min(u.length,i+a);var a=u.slice(f,c).map(function(r,t){var n=t+f+1;return(n==i?" > ":" ")+n+"| "+r}).join("\n");n.path=e;n.message=(e||"Pug")+":"+i+"\n"+a+"\n\n"+n.message;throw n}},{1:1}],3:[function(r,t,n){"use strict";window.pug=r(2)},{2:2}]},{},[3]);

  <div class="widget code html widget-editable viziwyg-section-19 inpage-widget-689402">
   <script async="" src="https://felix.data.tm-awx.com/felix.min.js">
   </script>
  </div>
  <script>
   window.console.log("iPhone/Edge Fix v2 running...");
(function (doc) {
var agnt = navigator.userAgent;
var css = ".captify-widget>div>div>div{padding-bottom:30px!important}";
var count = 300; // 300 * 100ms == 30000ms limit
function isIphone() {
return /iPhone/.test(agnt);
}
function isEdge() {
return /Edge/.test(agnt);
}
function isEdgeOrIphone() {
return isIphone() || isEdge();
}
function applyFix() {
var ifr = doc.querySelector(".captify-iframe");
if (ifr && isEdge(agnt)) {
fixEdge(ifr);
} else if (ifr && ifr.contentDocument && ifr.contentDocument.head && isIphone(agnt)) {
fixIphone(ifr.contentDocument);
} else {
count--;
if (count) {
setTimeout(applyFix, 100);
}
}
}
function fixIphone(doc) {
var styleTag = doc.createElement("style");
styleTag.type = "text/css";
styleTag.appendChild(doc.createTextNode(css));
styleTag.cssText = doc.head.appendChild(styleTag);
}
function fixEdge(ifr) {
if (ifr.contentDocument && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes.length) {
//finished
}
else {
ifr.classList.add("hidden");
count = 100; // 100 * 50ms == 5000ms limit
setTimeout(unhideEdge, 50, ifr);
}
}
function unhideEdge(ifr){
if (ifr.contentDocument && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes && ifr.contentDocument.childNodes.length) {
ifr.classList.remove("hidden");
} else {
count--;
if (count) {
setTimeout(unhideEdge, 50, ifr);
}
}
}
if (isEdgeOrIphone()) {
applyFix();
}
})(document);
  </script>
  <div class="lazy-resources" data-css="[]" data-immediate="" data-js="[]" data-mod="lazyResources">
  </div>
